## find variable

Similar to `Array.find()`<!-- -->, but uses [equiv](./equiv.equiv.md) as default predicate.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
find: <T>(src: ArrayLike<T>, x: T, equiv?: import("@thi.ng/api").Fn2<T, T, boolean>) => T | undefined
```
